page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DARREN
page.content: 7.30 a.m. the alarm clock goes off. I force myself out of bed and go down stairs. I arrive at school at 8.30. and play football until 8.55. We go into assembly at 9.00. During the morning we do Maths , English and Reading Laboratory. At dinner time I have a packed lunch from 12.30 to 1.25. We play football in the playground. 1.25 we come in and do our project or R.I. until 3.45. we have a playtime in between. Straight from school I go to my Nans where I watch television, have some biscuits and drink some coffee. At 5.00 p.m. I walk home to have some tea. After tea I go to the park to play football with my friend, and his Dad . I come home and go to bed at 9. 30. p.m.
